title: please help
body: I've tried making a few new item sets just like i have done in the past with no fail but after re-installing league because i had no space on my hard drive I can't use item sets anymore. I can still make them and save them but I cant seem to get that drop down tab on the recommended tab in the store in game. Help would be greatly appreciated thank you :)

replies.body:
Hey there,

You have no free space on your hard drive currently? This would be a problem as the system needs somewhere to save the item sets.
